parameters.name: BackupSetID
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The value is case-sensitive and can contain a maximum of 64 ASCII characters in length.

parameters.name: ComputeResource
parameters.description:
The computing resources of the cluster. This parameter is required if the Mode parameter is set to **Flexible**.

>  You can call the [DescribeAvailableResource](~~190632~~) operation to query the computing resources that are available within a specific region.

parameters.name: DBClusterCategory
parameters.description:
The edition of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **Cluster**: reserved mode for Cluster Edition

<!---->

*   **MixedStorage**: elastic mode for Cluster Edition

>  If the DBClusterCategory parameter is set to Cluster, you must set the Mode parameter to Reserver. If the DBClusterCategory parameter is set to MixedStorage, you must set the Mode parameter to Flexible. Otherwise, the cluster fails to be created.

parameters.name: DBClusterClass
parameters.description:
The specification of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **C8**
*   **C32**

>  This parameter is required if the Mode parameter is set to Reserver.

parameters.name: DBClusterDescription
parameters.description:
The description of the cluster.

*   The description cannot start with `http://` or `https`.
*   The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBClusterNetworkType
parameters.description: The network type of the cluster. Set the value to **VPC**.

parameters.name: DBClusterVersion
parameters.description: The version of the cluster. Set the value to **3.0**.

parameters.name: DBNodeGroupCount
parameters.description:
The number of node groups. Valid values: 1 to 200 (integer).

>  This parameter is required if the Mode parameter is set to Reserver.

parameters.name: DBNodeStorage
parameters.description:
The storage capacity of the cluster. Unit: GB.

*   Valid values when DBClusterClass is set to C8: 100 to 1000
*   Valid values when DBClusterClass is set to C32: 100 to 8000

> * This parameter is required if the Mode parameter is set to Reserver.
> * 1000 The storage capacity less than 1,000 GB increases in 100 GB increments. The storage capacity greater than 1,000 GB increases in 1,000 GB increments.

parameters.name: DiskEncryption
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable disk encryption.

Valid values:

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: ElasticIOResource
parameters.description: The number of elastic I/O units (EIUs). For more information, see [Use EIUs to scale up storage resources](~~189505~~).

parameters.name: ExecutorCount
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: KmsId
parameters.description: The Key Management Service (KMS) ID that is used for disk encryption. This parameter is valid only when DiskEncryption is set to true.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
The mode of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **Reserver**: the reserved mode.
*   **Flexible**: the elastic mode.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go
*   **Prepaid**: subscription

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The subscription type of the subscription cluster. Valid values:

*   **Year**: subscription on a yearly basis
*   **Month**: subscription on a monthly basis

>  This parameter is required if the PayType parameter is set to Prepaid.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the cluster belongs.

parameters.name: RestoreTime
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: RestoreType
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: SourceDBInstanceName
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: StorageResource
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags to add to the cluster.

parameters.name: UsedTime
parameters.description:
The subscription period of the subscription cluster.

*   Valid values when Period is set to Year: 1, 2, 3, and 5 (integer)
*   Valid values when Period is set to Month: 1 to 11 (integer)

> * This parameter is required if the PayType parameter is set to Prepaid.
> * Longer subscription periods offer more savings. Purchasing a cluster for one year is more cost-effective than purchasing the cluster for 10 or 11 months.

parameters.name: VPCId
parameters.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) ID of the cluster.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The vSwitch ID of the cluster.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description:
The zone ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
